message.name: ERR_WRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_FV_INVALID_AMOUNT
message.locale: Attempting to write-off a negative amount.

message.name: ERR_WRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_XFV_INVALID_WRITEOFF
message.locale: Attempting to write-off a reversed or partially allocated entry.

message.name: ERR_WRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_XRV_INVALID_AMOUNT
message.locale: Attempting to write-off an amount greater than the unprocessed amount.

message.name: INF_WRITEOFF_FINANCIAL_ITEM
message.locale: The %1s, or part of this Financial Instruction, was written off. This Financial Instruction is associated with the Case %2s of type %3s for %4s, please review this write-off to determine if anything requires your attention.

message.name: INF_TOTAL_LIABILITY_AMOUNT
message.locale: The total amount of the liability is %1s.

message.name: INF_WRITEOFF_AMOUNT
message.locale: The amount of the liability written off is %1s.
